02 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 99 09

02 77 77 77 77 77 77 10 72 77 77 77 77 77 07

USART_STORE_STATE
03 00


USART_INIT_LOAD
01 00


USART_STORE_CONFIRM
04

06
 read by avrdude
..\bin\avrdude -p atmega48 -c usbasp -P com5 -U eeprom:r:-:h

 clear eeprom
..\bin\avrdude -p atmega48 -c usbasp -P com5 -U eeprom:w:zero.i:i
